sentences.sentence: Objective: to investigate the part influence factors of prothrombin time assay.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨凝血酶原时间测定的部分影响因素。

sentences.sentence: When the tissue damage, the release of thromboplastin to prothrombin into thrombin.
sentences.translation: 当组织损伤时，释放出凝血致活酶，把凝血酶原变成凝血酶。

sentences.sentence: Objective to explore effects of blood platelets and prothrombin time on mifepristone.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨米非司酮对血小板、血浆凝血酶原时间的影响。
